pullRequest.title: Improve blob dispatcher (10.10)
pullRequest.bodyText: Includes two backports (regexp and ecm:path) to sync code with master.

commit.message: NXP-28227: allow blob dispatch on doc's ecm:path
NXP-28267: allow full regexp-based value match for blob dispatch
NXP-28975: fix default blob dispatcher != operator
NXP-28986: allow >= and <= operators in default blob dispatcher
NXP-28987: allow float values in default blob dispatcher
NXP-28987: allow date values in default blob dispatcher
NXP-28989: make default blob dispatcher easier to subclass
